text:
Khushi Kapoor All Set To Follow In Sister Janhvi's Footsteps As KJo Confirms Her Launch In 2019
Khushi Kapoor All Set To Follow In Sister Janhvi's Footsteps As KJo Confirms Her Launch In 2019
After many star kids made a debut this year (Janhvi Kapoor, Sara Ali Khan, Ishaan Khatter to name a few) , this new year will have many more too. Yes, make way for the new kid in the block, Khushi Kapoor.
The youngest daughter of Sridevi and Boney Kapoor, Khushi Kapoor will be making her smashing debut with the help of Dharma head honcho Karan Johar. Needless to say, KJo has officially become the godfather for all the newcomers.
Instagram
Karan Johar who was on best buddy Neha Dhupia’s No Filter With Neha show revealed that he is soon going to launch Khushi Kapoor.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
Neha quizzed KJo which star kids he will be launching in 2019 and he replied,
“Mizaan is going to be amazing; he is a potential big star and a great dancer. And Khushi perhaps, she is gorgeous and lovely.”
Instagram
Mizaan is Javed Jaffery’s son while Khushi is already popular thanks to the Kapoor surname. This year, we saw Khushi’s elder sister Janhvi making her debut with Dhadak, which was appreciated by fans. And now, we are sure Janhvi will guide her sister throughout her mega acting debut.
How excited are you to see the new Kapoor girl next year?
title: Khushi Kapoor All Set To Follow In Sister Janhvi's Footsteps As KJo Confirms Her Launch In 2019
description: Make way for the new kid in the block, Khushi Kapoor. The youngest daughter of Sridevi and Boney Kapoor. Khushi Kapoor will be making her smashing debut with the help of Karan Johar who officially the godfather for all the new comers.Karan Johar who was on best buddy Neha Dhupia’s No Filter With Neha show revealed that soon he is going to launch Khushi Kapoor.
